operation.name: update
operation.sql: update dc_squad set squad_name =?, squad_desc=?, axiser=?, cubers=?, followers=?, investors=?, status=?, gmt_modify=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = ?;
operation.sqlmap:
update dc_squad set gmt_modify=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, <dynamic> <isNotEmpty property="squadName"> squad_name = #squadName#, </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="squadName"> squad_desc = #squadName#, </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="axiser"> axiser = #axiser#, </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="cubers"> cubers = #cubers#, </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="followers"> followers = #followers#, </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="investors"> investors = #investors#, </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="status"> status = #status# </isNotEmpty>
</dynamic> where id = #id#;

operation.name: query
operation.sql: select * from dc_squad where squad_name = ? and axiser = ? and cubers = ? and followers = ? and investors = ? and status = ? and gmt_create =? and gmt_modify = ?;
operation.sqlmap: select * from dc_squad <dynamic prepend="where"> <isNotEmpty prepend="and" property="squadName"> squad_name = #squadName# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="and" property="axiser"> axiser = #axiser# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="and" property="cubers"> cubers = #cubers# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="and" property="followers"> followers = #followers# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="and" property="investors"> investors = #investors# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="and" property="status"> status = #status# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="and" property="gmtCreate"> ${cdata-start} gmt_create >= date('#gmtCreate#') ${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="and" property="gmtModify"> ${cdata-start} gmt_modify >= date('#gmtModify#') ${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty> </dynamic>
